greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Iterated sum of divisors array A[k,n] = k-th iterate of sigma(n), by antidiagonals.
comment: First row is sigma(n) = sum of divisors of n = A000203. Second row is sigma(sigma(n)) = A051027. Third Row is sigma(sigma(sigma(n))) = A066971. 4th row is sigma(sigma(sigma(sigma(n)))). Main diagonal is A[n,n] = A000203(A000203(A000203(...A000203(n)...))) where iteration is n deep = A090896(n). First column is all 1. Second column is A007497.
formula: A[k,n] = sigma^k(n), where sigma^k denotes functional iteration.
maple: A129246 := proc(k,n) option remember ; if k= 1 then numtheory[sigma](n); else A129246(k-1,numtheory[sigma](n)) ; fi ; end: for d from 1 to 13 do for n from 1 to d do printf("%d, ",A129246(d+1-n,n)) ; od: od: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 09 2007
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, May 27 2007
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 09 2007
